amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike funds for the United Nations Educational, Scientific, and Cultural Organization.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the funds in the bill for UNESCO.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 279 (Roll no. 405).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Paul.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
